item.title: Maple Place, 10th June
item.description:
The cap of the pipe leading into the main drain has popped off. This is causing us to have a problem with rats coming out from this pipe and into our loading bay. Please can someone attend to resolve this. This also means the drains smell bad.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maple Place, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning not carried out as scheduled, 10th June
item.description:
Both the pavement and the road were scheduled to be swept today. The gutter is still full of debris particularly from overhanging trees. The pavement has not been swept for months and weeds and moss are growing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Otford Close, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement continuously being blocked by beck Evan’s and enterprise., 10th June
item.description:
Beck Evan’s and enterprise continuously blocking pavements. Due to there incompetence it makes it very hard crossing roads with buggy’s, the pavements in this part of Bexley aren’t great as it is. And trying to cross cray rd is very difficult as the crossings fall at both ends of the road 0.5 miles. This issue seems to appear on a daily occurrence. Please can Bexley council support the locals who live here to help improve this part of Bexley. We’ve this being outskirts of Bexley It would be great to implement possibly a zebra crossing of some sort and some sort of way of stopping the company’s from violating the walkways. Thanks you for your help. Really hope the council can look forward and support us on this matter. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Cray Road, North Cray, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
